gobblin.data.management.copy.hive

Class HiveDatasetFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.data.management.copy.hive.HiveDatasetFinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatasetsFinder<HiveDataset>, IterableDatasetFinder<HiveDataset>

    public class HiveDatasetFinder
extends Object
implements IterableDatasetFinder<HiveDataset>
    Finds HiveDatasets. Will look for tables in a database using a WhitelistBlacklist, and creates a HiveDataset for each one.
